items.title: Figma - Website Wireframing (Streamlined)
items.description: I love using Figma, but I am still looking for a good workflow while making designs. This video inspired me with some great component ideas to make wireframes or designs faster.
items.author: Karl Rombauts

items.description:
![World Vegan Day](assets/worldveganday.png "World Vegan Day")

The 1ste of November was world vegan day. There are many initiatives that promote the vegan lifestyle in November. There is a general consensus in the scientific community that switching to a mostly plant-based diet is a necessary step in the fight against climate change.
items.title: World vegan day
Notion.so
items.description: A long long time ago I used Notion, but it didn't work out at the time. Now I've been using Bear App as a main note taking app. I do miss a few features like being able to put a reminder on notes or put it on a calendar. So I took another look at Notion and now I can't look back.

items.title: Socratic
items.description: Socratic was built to support Science, Math, Literature, Social Studies, and more. With help from teachers, Socratic brings you visual explanations of important concepts in each subject.

items.title: GIFS and prefers-reduced-motion
items.description: Rather than entirely stopping the GIF, you can put animated and non-animated images on top of each other (inside a `<details>` element) and allow them to be “played” on demand.

author: Wheelhouse
title: It's time for our 5 November picks
introduction: Each month we pick 1 thing we found very interesting and put it into a list. This list might give you some insight in how Wheelhouse thinks and what intrigues us. This time we're sharing our picks for November.
description: Our monthly picks where each of us pick something we liked in the past month.
